entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Mackenzie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:53 PM PST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mackenzie Airport 7:52 PM PST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: -0.7°C
Wind: SSE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 02 February 2023
